titles.title: It Is The Time To Take The Kingdom

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
It is the time to take the kingdom.
Rise up ye strong 'tis Christ's command.
For every power and dominion,
Is given now into your hand.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You who have ears to hear the trumpet,
You who have hearts to understand,
It is time to take the kingdom.
Rise up ye strong, possess your land.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Es tiempo de tomar el reino
Guerreros todos id en pos.
Oid el son de la trompeta
Y entended el plan de Dios.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Es tiempo de tomar el reino,
Guerreros todos id en pos.
Todo poder y principado
Son sometidos ante Dios.
